title: What is 5 ft 6 inches and 2 ft 9 inches in square feet? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's a very simple question .. 1ft = 12 inches 5ft 6″ ? = 12×5 + 6″ = 60″+6 “ = 66” Total 66″ 2ft 9″ find ? 12×2+9″ = 24″+9 = 33″ Now find to ft 1 inch = 0.0833 ft Then 66×0.0833 = 5.5 ft Convert 33 × 0.0833 = 2.75 ft Here to square ft 5.5× 2.75 = 15.12 square feet Answer is 15.12 Square feet.. Thanks

Hello, Garrick Saito’s answer is correct but there is an alternative way to calculate similar sums. Convert to inches 5 ft 6 inches 66 inches. 2 ft 9 inches = 33 inches. 66 x 33 = 2178 in² divide by 144 (1 square foot) = 15.125 ft² = 15 ft² 18 in² Regards, James.
